name: Back To School (Ironfred, FlameLizardCodes, Radowicht)
description:
You’re back in school but this little trip down memory lane certainly didn’t go as planned. The volume of the clock gets louder every 10 seconds. After two minutes, a bloodthirsty teddy will spawn for 30 seconds, wanting to eat the player and screaming “Heehee” every 10 seconds. Make your way through the classrooms you once attended and find an escape from this horrible school.

Are you wondering what Teddy is all about? Has he always been this bloodthirsty monster?

Once there was a time when Teddy just wanted to reach for the stars. He flew higher and higher in his hot air balloon. But fate struck, and he… changed.

You can find the acclaimed prequel to Teddy and his adventure “above the clouds” here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/above-the-clouds

Controls: Move: W, A, S, D

Credits

Game Design: Radowicht, Ironfred, T.I.M.O, FlameLizard
Level Design: Ironfred
Code: Radowicht, Ironfred
AI: Radowicht
Art: Ironfred
Sound: T.I.M.O, FlameLizard
